page.title: 17Farmland
page.content: The Block contains 13 Sites,10 of which are Farms:- PARKPLACE Farm mainly dairy & cereal MIDDLE CULHAM Farm beef & pigs UPPER CULHAM Farm pigs & cereal CULHAM PARK Farm beef & horses WORLEY'S Farm dairy HATCHGATE Farm beef & cereal GIBSTROUDE Farm dairy,beef & cereal HENNERTON Farm pigs & beef SHEEPHOUSE Farm market gardening,pigs LOWER BOLNEY Farm market gardening Parkplace Farm also farms Worley's, Hatchgate,the SITE S.of Harpsden-cereal & grass & TEMPLE COMBE-cereal & dairy. The third SITE is E.of Sheephouse Farm- cereal & beef.4 Sites-dairy,6 have beef 4 have pigs,8 grow cereal(+Sheephouse), 2 have market gardening,& 1 has grass without animals.4 Sites have animals only,2 have crops only & 7 have both. 3/12 of the Block is crops,7/12 grass.
